metadata.name: ImagingDevices Unusual Parent/Child Processes
metadata.comment: Detects unusual parent or children of the ImagingDevices.exe (Windows Contacts) process as seen being used with Bumblebee activity

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND ((endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\wmiprvse.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\svchost.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\dllhost.exe'))) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\imagingdevices.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\imagingdevices.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects unusual parent or children of the ImagingDevices.exe (Windows Contacts) process as seen being used with Bumblebee activity
